actions-list.actionItem: Pursuant to the order of Wednesday, February 5, 2025,  the Journal of the proceedings of the Senate was deemed approved to date.
Pursuant to the order of Wednesday, February 5, 2025, the morning hour being deemed expired, and the times for the recognition of the two leaders being reserved.
The following transactions of morning business occurred on today.

PN11-16:
        Tulsi Gabbard, of Hawaii, to be Director of National Intelligence

        -- Considered by Senate.

        -- Cloture invoked in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 52 - 46. Record Vote Number: 49 


        -- By unanimous consent agreement, debate 2/11/2025.
Under the authority of the order of today, at  7:15 p.m, the Presiding Officer (Mr. Moreno in the chair) declared the Senate adjourned, under its order of today, until 10 a.m. tomorrow.
